headline: Billionaire Bill Gates Owns $2.5 Billion of This Dow Jones Stock. Should You Buy It, Too?
summary: Caterpillar (NYSE: CAT) is a top-five holding of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation Trust, and it's also a stock up 83% over the last three years and 176% over the last five.  Does it make sense to follow the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation Trust and buy the stock?  As always with Caterpillar, investors should be mindful that it's a cyclical company, so its sales tend to oscillate according to a trend.
